benchmark_details.name: Optimizing Recommendations using Fine-Tuned LLMs
benchmark_details.overview: This paper proposes a novel framework for generating synthetic datasets tailored to conversational search and recommendations, enabling personalized and expressive queries in media recommendations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance media recommendation systems using synthetic datasets and fine-tuned large language models.

data.source: Synthetic datasets generated by modeling real-world user interactions using large language models.
data.annotation: Automatically generated through language modeling techniques.

methodology.calculation: Macro-F1 is calculated by considering performance on all classes to ensure fairness.
methodology.interpretation: A higher Macro-F1 score indicates better performance in capturing both entities and intents.
methodology.baseline_results: Fine-tuned Llama 3.2 3B achieved a Macro-F1 score of 1.0, significantly outperforming baseline models.
methodology.validation: Results compared against baseline models on Hugging Face to assess effectiveness.
